test-case.description: Install-WSLEnvironment should accept all parameters
test-case.name: ConfigureWSL Main Function.Install-WSLEnvironment should accept all parameters

failure.message: Expected: the expression not to throw an exception. Message was {Critical error during script execution: This module requires Administrator privileges. Please restart PowerShell as Administrator.} from F:\Github\configure-wsl\src\ConfigureWSL.psm1:872 char:9 + Write-Log "Critical error during script execution: $_" -Level ... + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
failure.stack-trace: at line: 309 in F:\Github\configure-wsl\tests\ConfigureWSL.Compatible.Tests.ps1 309: { Install-WSLEnvironment -DistroName "Ubuntu" -SkipFontInstall -SkipStarship -LogPath $testLogPath } | Should Not Throw
